message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start.
Let's flip the script, 60-40 in my favor this time.  It's only fair since you got the better deal last round!
I'll give you a bit more, but 60-40 is still too much for you.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'm willing to give you a little more, but 60-40 is still the fairest deal.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
I'm starting to think we're just going to keep going back and forth.  How about we split it 56-44 this time, and we can finally be done with this?
You're right, we are going back and forth. But I'm willing to give a bit more. Take it before the inflation gets worse.
Let's try this one more time.  If we split it 54-46, I think we can finally reach an agreement and both walk away with something.
Come on, Bob. The inflation is killing your share. Take this and we're done.
